text: “Kodi ndani woipitsitsa koposa yemwe wampekera bodza Allah kapena wonena: “Kwavumbulutsidwa kwa ine,” pomwe sikunavumbulutsidwe kwa iye chilichonse; ndi yemwe akunena: ‘“Ndivumbulutsa monga chimene Allah wavumbulutsa.” Ukadawaona anthu ochita zoipa akuthatha ndi imfa, nawo angelo atatambasula manja awo (powamenya uku akuwauza): “Tulutsani moyo wanu; lero mulipidwa chilango chonyozetsa chifukwa cha zomwe mudali kunenera Allah popanda choonadi, ndi kudzitukumula kwanu pa zizindikiro zake.” (Ukadaona zoopsa kwabasi)
